comments.body: Welcome to the forum, although you've promoted your casino in Games and Rounds section.You can't freely to create a new thread in this section, if you want to promote or update anything related to your casino, you can only post in this thread.In the another thread, you suggest someone to access your site using VPN when there's a rule about forbid VPN usage in your terms.Quote from: https://ninjastic.space/post/63067277Hello, NeilLostBitcoin. It appears that you might be experiencing difficulty accessing our website. To resolve this issue, you could try using a VPN and then attempt to access our site again. If you have any questions or encounter further issues, please don't hesitate to reach out. We're here to assist you.Quote from: libert19 on October 29, 2023, 02:25:48 AMQuote14.4 The attempt to manipulate your real location through the use of VPN, proxy, or similar services or through the provision of incorrect or misleading information about your place of residence, with the intent to circumvent geo-blocking or jurisdiction restrictions, constitutes a breach of Clause 5 of this Terms of Service.Either paid shill or your alt account Step into a World of Ultimate Gaming Paradise with SEABET.io.That been said, the casino looks sketchy.Quote from: Text on November 07, 2023, 08:57:41 AMAlso, can you confirm which one is the official and correct domain: Seabet.io or Seabet9.io? comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Op there was a similar account that did this same thing; I believe it was “9G” they kept creating threads upon threads and neglected all suggestions that was presented to them and yesterday I received several notification that majority of the threads have been nuked by moderator. So if you don’t want the same fate then just go on and create on dedicated thread as your Ann thread and post any new update that may arise because right now there’s no official thread if a user wants to discuss about your site it will be difficult. So just purchase copper membership and create a professional thread.

comments.author: bitLeap
comments.created_time: November 07, 2023, 12:52:48 PMLast edit: November 07, 2023, 01:04:59 PM by bitLeap
comments.body: Welcome to the Bitcointalk forum, maybe you should hire a trusted member to post a neater and more organized looking thread showing your desired casino design.I just visited your casino and successfully registered, I was not in a restricted area so had no problems the first time I clicked on the link. It's just that after registering and starting to log in, I experienced a problem saying that my account was disabled so I had to contact customer service. It's really strange, even though I wanted to immediately study the applicable rules before deciding to make a deposit to take part in the promotional bonus offered.After contacting support, they said that users in my area were flooding registrations so they did a mass ban. Again quite surprising for me as this is the first time having this problem. In other words the conclusion means I will not be able to play for this casino.

comments.author: Slow death
comments.body: welcome to the forum. I see that your casino has a TOS designer and it seemed to me to be a very fair TOS in terms of requirements and I suggest that everyone read the TOS first and then they can create an account, especially pay more attention to the part of the TOS that talks about deposits, withdrawals and betting. This is to avoid that after people create an account, deposit, play and win and when withdrawing, they make many withdrawals and are surprised by the casino's stance on this matter, so read the TOS carefully:https://www.seabet9.io/#/terms/rulesand if you decide to create an account at this casino, be aware of these rules, and for those problematic people who cannot control themselves when they play and create an account at the casino and then exclude themselves and then come to complain here on the forum, I suggest that you also take a lot of time to read their TOS about the self-exclusion part:https://www.seabet9.io/#/terms/selfExclusionI've seen cases of people complaining that they excluded an account but forgot to withdraw funds from the account, so read carefully what their TOS says about this to avoid complaining later
